languages.text:
Always in the thick of battle, using their leadership and combat prowess, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tacticians{/g} are able to harness the {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} of their party to enhance the combat effectiveness of their allies and themselves.
Core focus: scaling with party success, long-term single-target buffs, momentum, versatility.

traits.locale_text:
Always in the thick of battle, using their leadership and combat prowess, Master Tacticians are able to harness the momentum of their party to enhance the combat effectiveness of their allies and themselves.
Primary Goal: scaling with party success, long-term single-target buffs, momentum, versatility.

Always in the thick of battle, using their leadership and combat prowess, Master Tacticians are able to harness the momentum of their party to enhance the combat effectiveness of their allies and themselves.
Primary Goal: scaling with party success, long-term single-target buffs, momentum, versatility.

Always in the thick of battle, using their leadership and combat prowess, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tacticians{/g} are able to harness the {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} of their party to enhance the combat effectiveness of their allies and themselves.
Core focus: scaling with party success, long-term single-target buffs, momentum, versatility.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}战术专家{/g}会灵活运用领导能力与战斗能力，在战斗最激烈的时候鼓舞团队的{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}士气{/g}，提高自己与盟友的战斗能力。
核心：战况优势时的加成效果，单个目标的长效加成效果，运用士气，灵活作战。
languages.original_text:
Always in the thick of battle, using their leadership and combat prowess, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tacticians{/g} are able to harness the {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} of their party to enhance the combat effectiveness of their allies and themselves.
Core focus: scaling with party success, long-term single-target buffs, momentum, versatility.

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}战术专家{/g}会灵活运用领导能力与战斗能力，在战斗最激烈的时候鼓舞团队的{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}士气{/g}，提高自己与盟友的战斗能力。
主要目标：战况处于优势时获得加成，针对单个目标的长期加成效果，士气，灵活作战。

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Meistertaktiker{/g} stehen immer mitten im Kampf und setzen ihre Führungs- und Kampffähigkeiten ein, um die {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}Dynamik{/g} ihrer Gruppe zu nutzen und die Kampfeffektivität ihrer Verbündeten zu verbessern.
Hauptfokus: Skalierung mit dem Erfolg der Gruppe, langfristige Einzelziel-Buffs, Dynamik, Vielseitigkeit.
languages.original_text:
Always in the thick of battle, using their leadership and combat prowess, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tacticians{/g} are able to harness the {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} of their party to enhance the combat effectiveness of their allies and themselves.
Core focus: scaling with party success, long-term single-target buffs, momentum, versatility.

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Meistertaktiker{/g} stehen immer mitten im Kampf und setzen ihre Führungs- und Kampffähigkeiten ein, um die {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}Dynamik{/g} ihrer Gruppe zu nutzen und die Effektivität des Kampfes ihrer Verbündeten und ihrer selbst zu verbessern.
Primäres Ziel: Skalierung mit dem Erfolg der Gruppe, langfristige Einzelziel-Buffs, Dynamik, Vielseitigkeit.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Мастер-тактик{/g} всегда в гуще битвы. Благодаря лидерским качествам и навыкам ведения боя он способен направить {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}моментум{/g} отряда на повышение своей эффективности и эффективности союзников.
Ключевые особенности: масштабирование успеха отряда, длительные положительные эффекты на одиночную цель, моментум, универсальность.
languages.original_text:
Always in the thick of battle, using their leadership and combat prowess, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tacticians{/g} are able to harness the {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} of their party to enhance the combat effectiveness of their allies and themselves.
Core focus: scaling with party success, long-term single-target buffs, momentum, versatility.

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Тактик{/g} всегда в гуще битвы. Благодаря лидерским качествам и навыкам ведения боя он способен направить {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}моментум{/g} отряда на повышение своей эффективности и эффективности союзников.
Основная цель: масштабирование успеха отряда, длительные положительные эффекты на одиночную цель, моментум, универсальность.

{g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Тактик{/g} всегда в гуще битвы. Благодаря лидерским качествам и навыкам ведения боя он способен направить {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}моментум{/g} отряда на повышение своей эффективности и эффективности союзников.
Основная цель: масштабирование успеха отряда, длительные положительные эффекты на одиночную цель, моментум, универсальность.

languages.text:
Toujours au cœur de la bataille, les {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}maîtres tacticiens{/g} sont des commandants et des combattants prodigieux, capables d'exploiter la {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}fougue{/g} de leur groupe pour améliorer leur propre efficacité au combat et celle de leurs alliés.
Points forts : équilibre entre réussite du groupe, bonus pérennes à cible unique, fougue, polyvalence.
languages.original_text:
Always in the thick of battle, using their leadership and combat prowess, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tacticians{/g} are able to harness the {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} of their party to enhance the combat effectiveness of their allies and themselves.
Core focus: scaling with party success, long-term single-target buffs, momentum, versatility.

traits.locale_text:
Toujours au cœur de la bataille, les {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Tacticiens{/g} sont des commandants et des combattants prodigieux capables d'exploiter la {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}fougue{/g} de leur groupe pour améliorer leur propre efficacité au combat et celle de leurs alliés.
Objectif principal : équilibre entre réussite du groupe, bonus pérennes à cible unique, fougue, versatilité.

languages.text:
Los {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}maestros tácticos{/g} están en el meollo de la batalla, usando sus dotes de liderazgo y combate para dirigir el {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}ímpetu{/g} de su grupo y maximizar la eficacia, tanto propia como de sus aliados.
Especialidades: adaptarse al éxito del grupo, bonificaciones duraderas de un objetivo, ímpetu, versatilidad.
languages.original_text:
Always in the thick of battle, using their leadership and combat prowess, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tacticians{/g} are able to harness the {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} of their party to enhance the combat effectiveness of their allies and themselves.
Core focus: scaling with party success, long-term single-target buffs, momentum, versatility.

traits.locale_text:
Los {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}maestros tácticos{/g} están en el meollo de la batalla, usando sus dotes de liderazgo y combate para dirigir el {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}ímpetu{/g} de su grupo y maximizar la eficacia, tanto propia como de sus aliados.
Objetivos principales: adaptarse al éxito del grupo, bonificaciones duraderas de un objetivo, ímpetu, versatilidad.

languages.text:
常に戦いの渦中に身を置き、統率力と戦闘能力を持ち合わせる{g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}戦術の達人{/g}は、部隊の{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}推進力{/g}を活用して、味方と自身の戦闘効率を強化することができる。
コアフォーカス：部隊の成功による強化、持続的な単体対象バフ、推進力、汎用性。
languages.original_text:
Always in the thick of battle, using their leadership and combat prowess, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tacticians{/g} are able to harness the {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} of their party to enhance the combat effectiveness of their allies and themselves.
Core focus: scaling with party success, long-term single-target buffs, momentum, versatility.

traits.locale_text:
常に戦いの渦中に身を置き、統率力と戦闘能力を持ち合わせる{g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}戦術の達人{/g}は、部隊の{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}推進力{/g}を活用して、味方と自身の戦闘効率を強化することができる。
コアフォーカス：部隊の成功による強化、持続的な単体対象バフ、推進力、汎用性。

languages.text:
Her daim çatışma alanının göbeğinde olan ve liderliklerini, harp hünerlerini konuşturan {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Usta Taktisyenler{/g}; hem kendilerinin hem de dost birimlerin çatışmadaki etkiliğini artırmak amacıyla grubun {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentumundan{/g} yararlanırlar.
Güçlü yönleri: Grup başarısıyla ölçeklenme, tek hedef üstünde uzun süreli iyi etkiler, momentum, çok yönlülük.
languages.original_text:
Always in the thick of battle, using their leadership and combat prowess, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tacticians{/g} are able to harness the {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} of their party to enhance the combat effectiveness of their allies and themselves.
Core focus: scaling with party success, long-term single-target buffs, momentum, versatility.
